title: Topic 002 Question 047
body: You have a Microsoft 365 E5 subscription that contains a data loss prevention (DLP) policy named DLP1.
DLP1 has a rule that triggers numerous alerts.
You need to reduce the number of alert notifications that are generated. The solution must maintain the sensitivity of DLP1.
options: Change the mode of DLP1 to Test without notifications.
Modify the rule and increase the instance count.
Modify the rule and configure an alert threshold.
Modify the rule and set the priority to the highest value.
